mapper.select:
SELECT goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodImage, goodState, buyerNum, categoryId, goodNum FROM Good WHERE goodNum > 0
AND goodName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pageName}, '%')
AND categoryId = #{categoryId}
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageSize} * (#{pageNum} - 1)
SELECT goodDesc FROM Good WHERE goodId = #{goodId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Good (goodName, goodPrice, goodDesc, goodImage, buyerNum, goodState, categoryId) VALUES (#{goodName}, #{goodPrice}, #{goodDesc}, #{goodImage}, #{buyerNum}, #{goodState}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE Good SET goodState = #{goodState} WHERE goodId = #{goodId}
UPDATE Good SET goodNum = goodNum - #{changeNum} WHERE goodId = #{goodId} AND goodNum >= #{changeNum}
